title: Stratified sample of public and private schools

content.question: A researcher wanted to estimate the average amount of money spent on extracurricular activities per school in a certain region. The researcher randomly selected 20 public schools and 20 private schools in the region to use for a sample. Which of the following best describes the type of sample that was taken?

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Describe an appropriate method for gathering and representing data.
